Name: The Wilds
FlavourText: Humid bushland and colossal trees. You are never alone in these wooded lands.

Name: The Sands
FlavourText: Arid heat and sweltering sands. A playground of devils and blood-starved beasts.

Name: The Caverns
FlavourText: Those who aren't crushed beneath rock and rubble contend against murderous creatures.

Name: The Deep
FlavourText: The uncharted depths of chaos and control. What scaled abominations lurk below?
